name: breach-marketplace
description: Security-focused plugin marketplace for Claude Code. Tools for vulnerability hunting, security review, and bug bounty workflows.

plugins.name: breach
plugins.description: Security vulnerability hunting toolkit. Ten-skill pipeline with autonomous looping discovery for expert bug hunters: source code reconnaissance with threat modeling and git history analysis, custom Semgrep/CodeQL rule generation tailored to the target codebase, automated static scanning (Semgrep + CodeQL), autonomous looping code analysis with coverage tracking and auto-shift on diminishing returns, variant analysis from findings/CVEs/disclosures with automated rule generation, canonical finding structure and PoC standards, finding validation with anti-hallucination gates and triager analysis, vulnerability chain discovery, human-verified reporting, and pipeline orchestration.

plugins.name: hackerone
plugins.description: HackerOne bug bounty platform integration. Navigate programs, reports, hacktivity, and earnings via the HackerOne Hacker API.

plugins.name: ai-collaboration
plugins.description: Cross-model AI consultation and task delegation via Codex CLI and Gemini CLI. Get second opinions, delegate code reviews, cross-check vulnerability assessments, and hand off discrete tasks to other AI models.
